connectionPools.name: SampleApp_Lite_Xml
connectionPools.description: SampleAppLite connection pool to XML datasource. This connection pool points the database to the location where physical XML files are stored. The location uses the value of an RPD variable : NQ_SESSION.SERVICEINSTANCEROOT.
